entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:21 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 8:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
Temperature: -38.5°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -42.6°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 41 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
